title: Rich Person

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Purchase people's services to have them work for you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with 100 gold.
- You can buy people's services to passively make money. If they die, they will no longer make money unless they can act while dead.
- You will learn the role of the people whose services you buy.
- You can control someone whose services you have purchased. You will receive all feedback they get from their action.
- You cannot control someone two times in a row.
- Twice per game, you can double the money you make at night. This is done at the beginning of the night, and all money you made that night will be doubled immediately. This can not be used twice in the same night.

fields.name: Prices:
fields.value:
- Killing alignments (TK, UO, RK, CE, MK, NK, NCs that can kill, etc.): 100 gold to buy, 50 gold per night.
-Protective alignments (TP, RP, Neutrals that protect, etc.): 50 gold to buy, 20 gold per night.
-Support alignments (TS, MS, MD, RS, etc.): 25 gold to buy, 10 gold per night
- Other alignments: (NB, NC's that can't kill, TI, etc.): 10 gold to buy, 5 gold per night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the good faction lose (this can win while dead).

desc:
Post 464
*"You know what language everyone speaks? Money."*
